title: Compound an IV Medication
description: A pharmacy technician in a clean room needs to compound an intravenous (IV) medication.

tasks.description: Review the recipe for the IV compound in the pharmacy system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Technician sees the list of ingredients and amounts needed.

tasks.description: Scan the barcodes of the base solution and all additives to ensure the correct components are used.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system verifies each ingredient as it is scanned.

tasks.description: Prepare the IV bag, print a label, and have a pharmacist perform the final check.
tasks.expected_outcome: The IV medication is prepared safely and accurately.
